client - Variable in class IOT.IOTRunner
A reference to the local instance of client.
client - Variable in class IOT.IOTServer.IOTServer
A reference to the instance of Client running on this node.
compatDevice - Variable in class IOT.IOTApplication.alarmclock.AlarmClockService
Devices that are able to subscribe to this service, ACS stands for AlarmClockService, CM for CoffeeMakerService, LBCS for LightBulbControlService
